  2. Microsoft employee: AI tool should be removed until ‘offensive images’ can be addressed  CNN
  3. Microsoft's Copilot Designer makes 'sexual, violent content': AI engineer  New York Post
  4. Whistleblowers are calling out flaws in AI chatbots and image tools  Axios
  5. Microsoft engineer who raised concerns about Copilot image creator pens letter to the FTC  Engadget
